page.title: 02Local Amenities.
page.content: Glenkindie Post Office,shop/caravan site, is the local shop serving a widely spread rural community.Many summer visitors boost trade.Winter business is quieter.There is a steady decline in visitors especially from abroad. Glenkindie Garage and shop provides an essential service to an area dependant on motor power for everyday living. The area has a public bus service which has been much reduced over the years.Concern is being expressed over its future. Community run activities, available locally to inhabitants of Upper Donside are,Gospel Guitar Group,Guild, Young Farmers, Cubs,Brownies,Guides, Sunday School,Bowling,W.R.I.and various church and school events.
